definition: to serve as/to act as/to play the role of
to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
(onom.) dong/ding dong (bell)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: They act as small laminated springs and keep the belt strap flat.
sentences.chinese: 它们可以充当小小的叠片弹簧，让安全带保持平整度。

sentences.english: Do you think China should play the role of an arbitrator in the dispute between India and Pakistan ?
sentences.chinese: 你认为中方是否应该在印巴冲突中充当调解者的角色？

sentences.english: With an asynchronous model, the queue itself acts as a relief valve.
sentences.chinese: 借助异步模型，队列本身可以充当一个减压阀。

sentences.english: In the world of international marketing, governments, quasi- government agencies, and profit-seeking and nonprofit entities are frequently buyers.
sentences.chinese: 以及赢利与非赢利实体都经常充当买家的角色。

sentences.english: This met the volunteer and to play amain role either by the donation or the participation.
sentences.chinese: 本会志愿者并且充当了一个主要角色或由捐赠或参加。

sentences.english: He was tried because he had acted as a Greman spy during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他因在战争期间充当德国人的间谍而受审。

sentences.english: An ISFP may find great satisfaction from volunteering as a counselor .
sentences.chinese: 在自愿充当顾问时，ISFP会得到极大的满足感。

sentences.english: The wood ant, for example, is a social creature, and acts as a slave for the blood-red ant Formica sanguinea.
sentences.chinese: 例如，木蚁是一种社会性动物，充当血红林蚁的奴隶。

sentences.english: Tiny models could be used as spies while gargantuan versions served as mobile armor.
sentences.chinese: 微小的型号能用于侦察，而巨型版本可充当移动机甲。

sentences.english: Yvan, less self-assured, acts as a mediator between the two.
sentences.chinese: 伊万缺少自我肯定，在他俩当中充当和事佬。

sentences.english: In direct sunlight they act as protective sunshades.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光直射下，他们充当保护遮阳篷。

sentences.english: She served her earring as a pin.
sentences.chinese: 她将她的耳环充当饰针。

sentences.english: Each software service can act as a service provider or requester.
sentences.chinese: 每个软件服务均可充当一个服务提供者或请求者。

sentences.english: On these cars, three slit windows functioned as opera windows.
sentences.chinese: 在这些车上，三个条状小窗充当了后侧壁板小窗。

sentences.english: Test not equal to idea, coffee and often act as my outlet wine.
sentences.chinese: 考试不如意时，咖啡便常常充当我的解愁酒。

definition: to act as/used erroneously for 作為|作为
to treat as/to regard as/to look upon as
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
to replace/to take the place of
to treat as/to regard as
to use for the purpose of/to serve as
to be used for
to sink down to/to be reduced to (sth inferior)
necessary/must have
to take upon oneself/to assume
to provide assistance/to aid
to exchange/to replace/to substitute for/to switch
to alternate/to take turns
to consider as/to take to be
daring vanguard/pioneer/leading figure
to rely on sth (for support etc)/to depend on
